name: virtual-photo-booth
description: A block-based WordPress plugin for virtual photo booth functionality
author: Your Name

scripts.copy-css: cp src/blocks/photo-booth/editor.css build/blocks/photo-booth/ && cp src/blocks/photo-booth/style.css build/blocks/photo-booth/ && cp src/blocks/gallery/editor.css build/blocks/gallery/ && cp src/blocks/gallery/style.css build/blocks/gallery/
